title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: 'I guess I have to think of some new goals now': Inside Mirra Andreeva's meteoric rise in 2025
description: Mirra Andreeva predicted she'd win her first 1000-level tournament this year. In February she did it -- and since then she's surpassed all expectations.
author: D'Arcy Maine

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia began on Wednesday, when Alexandre Muller saved two match points to down Jiri Lehecka and former World No. 8 Cameron Norrie began his campaign. View all the Rome tennis results from Wednesday below. title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continues on Thursday, when home favourite and Tour veteran Fabio Fognini begins his final outing at the ATP Masters 1000 event. Several other Italians will also be featured, including Matteo Arnaldi, #NextGenATP Federico Cina and a clash between Luca Nardi and Flavio Cobolli. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 08 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 11:00 ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) Not Before 13:00 WTA - Elisabetta Cocciaretto (ITA) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL) WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Lulu Sun (NZL) Not Before 19:00 ATP - Jacob Fearnley (GBR) vs [WC] Fabio Fognini (ITA) Not Before 20:30 WTA - Lucia Bronzetti (ITA) vs [12] Karolina Muchova (CZE) Grand Stand Arena - start 11:00 WTA - Naomi Osaka (JPN) vs [9] Paula Badosa (ESP) ATP - Mariano Navone (ARG) vs [WC] Federico Cina (ITA) ATP - [WC] Luca Nardi (ITA) vs Flavio Cobolli (ITA) Not Before 17:00 WTA - Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs [3] Jessica Pegula (USA) ATP - title: Raducanu & Norrie claim Rome wins as Boulter beaten
description: Emma Raducanu and Cameron Norrie win their first-round matches at the Italian Open in Rome but Katie Boulter suffers defeat in Rome.

title: Short turnarounds 'becoming normal' for Draper
description: British number one Jack Draper says he is "feeling good" after arriving at the Italian Open in Rome following a short turnaround from the Madrid Open final.

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 1 Recap
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d’Italia launched on Wednesday, May 7th at Rome’s Foro Italico, marking the final ATP Masters 1000 stop before Roland Garros. Day 1 saw the bottom half of the men’s draw battle in the Round of 128, with no seeded players in action but a packed slate of qualifiers, wildcards, and clay-court …
author: Jonathan

title: Internazionali BNL d’Italia, Rome Masters Draw 2025
description: The 2025 Rome Masters draw is live, and the main draw action will commence at the Foro Italico on Wednesday, May 7th. Jannik Sinner’s return to action after his 3-month negotiated failed doping test suspension is the main talking point. I’m sure he’ll be well received by the Italian fans, who mostly seem willing to …
author: Jonathan
